content:
Diagnosis:		Juvenile granulosa cell tumor of right ovary

Management:		Right salpingo-oophorectomy March 2024
		Adjuvant BEP chemotherapy commenced April 2024

Histology:		Stage IC juvenile granulosa cell tumor
		FOXL2 wild-type

Current Situation:	Pre-cycle 3 BEP review

[redacted name] attended clinic today for assessment prior to cycle 3 BEP chemotherapy. She has tolerated the first two cycles well with only grade 1 nausea and mild fatigue. Blood counts and biochemistry are satisfactory for proceeding with treatment. No evidence of ototoxicity or nephrotoxicity. Performance status remains 0.

CT scan performed last week shows no evidence of residual or metastatic disease. Tumor markers remain normal with inhibin B now within reference range at 28 pg/mL.

The plan is to proceed with cycle 3 BEP today. We will arrange final CT scan after completion of cycle 4. Follow-up appointment will be scheduled for 3 weeks' time.

cancer_timeline.value: Inhibin B now within reference range at 28 pg/mL
CT scan shows no evidence of residual or metastatic disease

status_updates.value: Stage IC juvenile granulosa cell tumor of ovary post surgery, responding well to adjuvant BEP chemotherapy with normal tumor markers
Grade 1 nausea and fatigue, no ototoxicity or nephrotoxicity
CT scan to be arranged after completion of cycle 4
